note:
Technoskeptic furry. Shark gremlin on the internet ~⅓ century old disgruntled navy vet irl. Friend of Eggbug. Currently Gundam obsessed. Bad at games.

I reshare a lot of art, 🔞 not always sfw.
No AI bs but me 🚫

Not plural to the best of my knowledge, but I tend to alternate between 2 main 'sonas (🦈 Despia and 🦦 Dori) depending on whatever mood I'm in

fields.name: Pronouns:
fields.value: She/her or it/its if feeling particularly synthy
